publications.title: RRT*-based path planning for continuum arms
publications.abstract: Continuum arms are bio-inspired devices that exhibit continuous, deformation. Rapidly-exploring random trees (RRT) is a traditional approach for performing efficient path planning...
publications.description: This paper presents an approach for continuum arm path planning using RRT* variants, discussing configuration-space formulation, sampling strategies, and convergence properties, with simulations and experiments demonstrating improved efficiency.
